column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I was in Chicago for the weekend
column2: and my girlfriend and I decided that we since we both loved pizza is would be a crime to not get some Chicago style pizza while we were in town.  The restaurant itself is very nice.  The décor is fairly modern
column3: though sparsely decorated.  We were seated quickly though we did have to wait several minutes for our waiter to get to us.  He did a drive by
column4: and said he would be with us soon during our wait though.  They were busy at the time
column5: so it wasn't a big deal.
